summary: Boston Scientific is Thursday's IBD Stock Of The Day. Shares are forming a double-bottom base, while approaching an early entry.

headline: Second phase of ADVANTAGE AF study of FARAPULSE™ Pulsed Field Ablation System meets primary safety and efficacy endpoints
summary: Boston Scientific Corporation (NYSE: BSX) today announced positive 12-month primary endpoint results from the second phase of the ADVANTAGE AF clinical trial evaluating the use of the FARAPULSE™ Pulsed Field Ablation (PFA) System* and adjunctive use of the FARAPOINT™ PFA Catheter in patients with persistent atrial fibrillation (AF). Key findings from the study were presented at the second annual PFA Live Case Summit in San Diego and simultaneously published in Circulation.

raw.headline: Second phase of ADVANTAGE AF study of FARAPULSE™ Pulsed Field Ablation System meets primary safety and efficacy endpoints

headline: BSX Q1 Earnings Call: Outperformance Driven by Cardiology and Electrophysiology, Guidance Raised Amid Tariff Headwinds
summary: Medical device company Boston Scientific (NYSE:BSX) announced better-than-expected revenue in Q1 CY2025, with sales up 20.9% year on year to $4.66 billion. The company expects next quarter’s revenue to be around $4.88 billion, close to analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.75 per share was 11.5% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Boston Scientific (NYSE:BSX) Announces CFO Retirement And Strong Earnings Growth
summary: Boston Scientific (NYSE:BSX) recently announced a significant change to its leadership team with the planned retirement of CFO Dan Brennan, to be succeeded by Jon Monson. Alongside this transition, Boston Scientific released robust Q1 2025 earnings, showing increased sales and net income year-over-year, which aligns well with the broader market trend of positive reactions to recent earnings reports. The company's stock saw a 3.85% rise over the past week amidst a market environment where...
